4 template<class Tx>
5 void set_rarray(size_t size, Tx* __restrict__ dest, Tx* __restrict__ src){
6 #pragma omp parallel for
7  for(size_t i=0; i<size; i++){
8  dest[i] = src[i];
9  }
10 }
11 
12 template<class Tx>
13 void update_forward_euler(size_t size, Tx* __restrict__ q, Tx* __restrict__ rhs, Tx* __restrict__ dt){
14 #pragma omp parallel for
15  for(size_t i=0; i<size; i++){
16  q[i] = q[i] + rhs[i]*dt[i];
17  }
18 }
19 
20 template<class Tx, class To>
21 void update_rk4(size_t size, Tx* __restrict__ q_i, Tx* __restrict__ q, Tx* __restrict__ rhs, Tx* __restrict__ dt, To order){
22 #pragma omp parallel for
23  for(size_t i=0; i<size; i++){
24  q_i[i] = q[i] + rhs[i]*dt[i]/(4.0 - order);
25  }
26 }

30  mesh_list.push_back(mesh);

39  logger_convergence->info(" ");

52 template <class Tx, class Tad>
53 bool Solver<Tx, Tad>::step(std::shared_ptr<Mesh<Tx,Tad>> mesh, size_t counter, Tx t){
54  auto ni = mesh->ni;
55  auto nj = mesh->nj;
56  auto nic = mesh->nic;
57  auto njc = mesh->njc;
58  auto nq = mesh->solution->nq;
59  auto ntrans = mesh->solution->ntrans;
60  Tx l2norm[nq+ntrans] = {1e10};
61 
62  auto iomanager = mesh->iomanager;
63  auto equation = mesh->equation;
64  auto solution = mesh->solution;
65 
66  equation->calc_dt(CFL);
67  config->profiler->reset_time_residual();
68 
69 #if defined(ENABLE_ADOLC)
70 
71 
72  trace_on(1);
73  for(size_t i=0; i<nic; i++){
74  for(size_t j=0; j<njc; j++){
75  for(size_t k=0; k<nq+ntrans; k++){
76  solution->a_q[i][j][k] <<= solution->q[i][j][k];
77  }
78  }
79  }
80  equation->calc_residual(solution->a_q.const_ref(), solution->a_rhs, true);
81 
82  for(size_t i=0; i<nic; i++){
83  for(size_t j=0; j<njc; j++){
84  for(size_t k=0; k<nq+ntrans; k++){
85  solution->a_rhs[i][j][k] >>= solution->rhs[i][j][k];
86  }
87  }
88  }
89 
90  trace_off();
91 
92  if(config->solver->order != config->solver->lhs_order){
93  equation->calc_residual(solution->a_q.const_ref(), solution->a_rhs, false);
94  for(size_t i=0; i<nic; i++){
95  for(size_t j=0; j<njc; j++){
96  for(size_t k=0; k<nq+ntrans; k++){
97  solution->rhs[i][j][k] = value(solution->a_rhs[i][j][k]);
98  }
99  }
100  }
101  }
102 #else
103  if(config->solver->scheme == "forward_euler"){
104  equation->calc_residual(solution->q.const_ref(), solution->rhs);
105  update_forward_euler(solution->q.size(), solution->q.data(), solution->rhs.data(), solution->dt.data());
106  }
107  else if(config->solver->scheme == "rk4_jameson"){
108 
109  for(size_t order=0; order<4; order++){
110  equation->calc_residual(solution->q_tmp.const_ref(), solution->rhs);
111  update_rk4(solution->q.size(), solution->q_tmp.data(), solution->q.data(), solution->rhs.data(), solution->dt.data(), order);
112  }
113 
114  set_rarray(solution->q.size(), solution->q.data(), solution->q_tmp.data());
115 
116  }
117 
118  else{
119  logger->critical("scheme not defined.");
120  }
121 
122 #endif
123  config->profiler->update_time_residual();
124 
125  Tx l2normq;
126  for(size_t k=0; k<nq+ntrans; k++){
127  l2normq = 0.0;
128  for(size_t i=0; i<nic; i++){
129  for(size_t j=0; j<njc; j++){
130  l2normq += solution->rhs[i][j][k]*solution->rhs[i][j][k];
131  }
132  }
133  l2norm[k] = sqrt(l2normq);
134  }
135 
136  if(counter > config->solver->iteration_max){
137  logger->info("Max iteration reached!");
138  iomanager->write(counter);
139  auto dt_main = config->profiler->current_time();
140  logger->info("Final:: Step: {:08d} Time: {:.2e} Wall Time: {:.2e} CFL: {:.2e} Density Norm: {:.2e}", counter, t, dt_main, CFL, l2norm[0]);
141  logger_convergence->info("{:08d} {:.2e} {:.2e} {:.2e} {:.2e} {:.2e} {:.2e} {:.2e}", counter, t, dt_main, CFL, l2norm[0], l2norm[1], l2norm[2], l2norm[3]);
142  return true;
143  }
144  // logger->debug("transport l2 {}", l2norm[4]);
145  if(l2norm[0] < config->solver->tolerance && l2norm[1] < config->solver->tolerance && 0){
146  logger->info("Convergence reached!");
147  iomanager->write(counter);
148  auto dt_main = config->profiler->current_time();
149  logger->info("Final:: Step: {:08d} Time: {:.2e} Wall Time: {:.2e} CFL: {:.2e} Density Norm: {:.2e}", counter, t, dt_main, CFL, l2norm[0]);
150  logger_convergence->info("{:08d} {:.2e} {:.2e} {:.2e} {:.2e} {:.2e} {:.2e} {:.2e}", counter, t, dt_main, CFL, l2norm[0], l2norm[1], l2norm[2], l2norm[3]);
151  return true;
152  }
153 #if defined(ENABLE_ADOLC)
154  config->profiler->reset_time_jacobian();
155  Tx *q_ptr = solution->q.data();
156  sparse_jac(1,solution->nt,solution->nt,solution->repeat,q_ptr,&solution->nnz,&solution->rind,&solution->cind,&solution->values,solution->options);
157  config->profiler->update_time_jacobian();
158  logger->debug("NNZ = {}", solution->nnz);
159 
160  if(counter == 0)
161  mesh->linearsolver->preallocate(solution->nnz);
162  Tx dt_local = 0.0;
163  for(size_t i=0; i<solution->nnz; i++){
164  const auto k_idx = solution->rind[i]%(nq+ntrans);
165  const auto j_idx = ((solution->rind[i]-k_idx)/(nq+ntrans))%njc;
166  const auto i_idx = (solution->rind[i] - k_idx - j_idx*(nq+ntrans))/njc/(nq+ntrans);
167  dt_local = solution->dt[i_idx][j_idx][k_idx];
168  solution->values[i] = -solution->values[i];
169  // std::cout<<dt_local<<std::endl;
170  if(solution->rind[i] == solution->cind[i]){solution->values[i] += 1.0/dt_local;}
171  }
172  config->profiler->reset_time_linearsolver();
173  mesh->linearsolver->set_lhs(solution->nnz, solution->rind, solution->cind, solution->values);
174  mesh->linearsolver->set_rhs(solution->rhs.data());
175  mesh->linearsolver->solve_and_update(solution->q.data(), UNDER_RELAXATION);
176  auto dt_perf = config->profiler->update_time_linearsolver();
177  //q[i][j][k] = q[i][j][k] + solution->rhs[i][j][k]*dt;
178 
179  logger->info("Linear algebra time = {:03.2f}", dt_perf);
180 
181  free(solution->rind); solution->rind=nullptr;
182  free(solution->cind); solution->cind=nullptr;
183  free(solution->values); solution->values=nullptr;
184 #else
185 #endif
186  if(counter % config->io->stdout_frequency == 0){
187  auto dt_main = config->profiler->current_time();
188  logger->info("Step: {:08d} Time: {:.2e} Wall Time: {:.2e} CFL: {:.2e} Density Norm: {:.2e}", counter, t, dt_main, CFL, l2norm[0]);
189  logger_convergence->info("{:08d} {:.2e} {:.2e} {:.2e} {:.2e} {:.2e} {:.2e} {:.2e}", counter, t, dt_main, CFL, l2norm[0], l2norm[1], l2norm[2], l2norm[3]);
190  }
191 
192  if(counter % config->io->fileout_frequency == 0){
193  iomanager->write(counter);
194  }
195  return false;
196 }
197 template <class Tx, class Tad>
198 void Solver<Tx, Tad>::solve(){
199  size_t counter = 0;
200  Tx t = 0.0;
201  logger->info("Welcome to structured!");
202  config->profiler->timer_main->reset();
203  while(1){
204  bool if_break = true;
205  for(auto&& mesh : mesh_list)
206  if_break = step(mesh, counter, t) && if_break;
207  if(if_break){
208  break;
209  }
210  t += 0;
211  counter += 1;
212  auto cfl_ramp = config->solver->cfl_ramp;
213  if(cfl_ramp){
214  auto cfl_ramp_iteration = config->solver->cfl_ramp_iteration;
215  if(counter > cfl_ramp_iteration){
216  auto cfl_ramp_exponent = config->solver->cfl_ramp_exponent;
217  CFL = pow(CFL, cfl_ramp_exponent);
218  CFL = std::min(CFL, static_cast<Tx>(1e12));
219  }
220  }
221 
222  auto under_relaxation_ramp = config->solver->under_relaxation_ramp;
223  if(under_relaxation_ramp){
224  auto under_relaxation_ramp_iteration = config->solver->under_relaxation_ramp_iteration;
225  if(counter > under_relaxation_ramp_iteration){
226  auto under_relaxation_ramp_exponent = config->solver->under_relaxation_ramp_exponent;
227  UNDER_RELAXATION = pow(UNDER_RELAXATION, under_relaxation_ramp_exponent);
228  UNDER_RELAXATION = std::min(UNDER_RELAXATION, static_cast<Tx>(10.0));
229  }
230  }
231 
232 
233 
234 
235  }
236 }
